title: Phil Spencer：Xbox One 版开始开发
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2014-4-25 17:07 编辑 



@XboxP3
After months of teaming up with Mojang, we can confirm that Minecraft X360 Edition will save transfer to Xbox One Edition...more news soon!
与Mojang联手合作几个月后，我们可以确认Minecraft X360 版将会移植到 Xbox One 版...即将会有更多消息！



ONE计划已经展开

看起来卡厚买ONE的念头重新亮起来了...

replies.author: a20001017
replies.txt_content: 早就计划了，才开始，playstation 4 vita 都有截图了

replies.txt_content: 速度啊！不然我的one会发霉啊！
